About the product:

The Redragoon 4-in-1 Gaming Keyboard, Mouse, Mouse Pad and Headet Combo is a great way to enhance your PC gaming experience. It features 4 Redragon gaming components to give you an edge in gaming. Redragon CENTROPHORUS 3200DPI Gaming Mouse, Redragon ARES Gaming Headset, and Redragon PISCES Gaming Mouse Pad.

The Redragon K503 HARPE Me,brane RGB Gaming Keyboard makes gaming look good. Not only is it engineeered and built to take a beating, it is loaded with features inclusing laserr engraved keys, quiet gaming keys, crisp and bright RGB backlighting.

Get into the game with the ambidextrous Redragon Centrophorus 3200DPI gaming mouse. This mouse is an entry-level powerhouse with three DPI settings, eight tuning weights and two programmable side mouse buttons.

Perfectly balanced mix between a innovative design, comfort, crystal clear sound, and a highly sensitive microphone. the Redragon Ares Gaming Headset packs a punch without breaking the bank.

The Redragon PISCES Gaming Mouse Pad is an anti slip and long lasting mousepad that is ideal for work or play. It features high density materials, a rubber bottom and a waterproof smooth cloth surface.

Feature:
  • 4in-1 gaming Keyboard, Mouse, Mouse Pad and Headset Combo
  • Redragon HARPE Membrane RGB Gaming Keyboard
  • Redragon CENTRPHORUS 3200DPI Gaming Mouse
  • Redragon ARES Gaming Headset
  • Redragon PISCES Gaming Mouse Pad

Specifications:
    Keyboard:
  • Keys: Full sized 104 Keybaord with numeric keypad.
  • RGB lighting: Laser engraved RGB backlit keys for razor sharp lighting.
  • Special Features: 19 conflict free keys/ anti-ghosting.
  • Multimedia Keys: 20

    • Mouse:
  • Sensor: Advanced Optical Sensor with 4 level DPI adjustment (800/1600/2400/3200)
  • Feet Pads: Teflon
  • Tuning Weights: 8x 2.4g metal weights
